dt: {bc}a curved or bent device for catching, holding, or pulling
{bc}something curved or bent like a hook
{bc}a flight or course of a ball that deviates from straight in a direction opposite to the dominant hand of the player propelling it
{bc}a short blow delivered with a circular motion by a boxer while the elbow remains bent and rigid

dt.t: the pitcher got the {wi}hook{/wi} after giving up three runs

dt: {bc}a device especially in music or writing that catches the attention

et: Middle English, from Old English {it}hōc{/it}; akin to Middle Dutch {it}hoec{/it} fishhook, corner, Lithuanian {it}kengė{/it} hook
shortdef: a curved or bent device for catching, holding, or pulling
something intended to attract and ensnare

dt: {bc}to seize or make fast by or as if by a hook
{bc}to connect by or as if by a hook
{bc}to make (something, such as a rug) by drawing loops of yarn, thread, or cloth through a coarse fabric with a hook
{bc}to hit or throw (a ball) so that a hook results

shortdef: to form into a hook : crook
to seize or make fast by or as if by a hook
to connect by or as if by a hook —often used with up

dt: {bc}a 2-part fastening device (as on a garment or a door) consisting of a metal hook that catches over a bar or into a loop

shortdef: a 2-part fastening device (as on a garment or a door) consisting of a metal hook that catches over a bar or into a loop

dt: {bc}a piece of mobile fire apparatus carrying ladders and usually other firefighting and rescue equipment

shortdef: a piece of mobile fire apparatus carrying ladders and usually other firefighting and rescue equipment —called also hook and ladder, ladder truck

dt: {bc}an act or instance of attempting to knock the puck away from an opponent in ice hockey by hooking it with the stick

shortdef: an act or instance of attempting to knock the puck away from an opponent in ice hockey by hooking it with the stick

dt.t: fell for the story {it}hook, line and sinker{/it}

et: from analogy with a well-hooked fish

dt: {bc}a shot in basketball made usually while standing sideways to the basket by swinging the ball up in an arc with the far hand

shortdef: a shot in basketball made usually while standing sideways to the basket by swinging the ball up in an arc with the far hand

dt: {bc}to become associated especially in a working, social, or sexual relationship

shortdef: to become associated especially in a working, social, or sexual relationship

dt: {d_link|headland|headland} on the coast southwest of The Hague in the South Holland province in the southwestern part of the Netherlands

shortdef: headland on the coast southwest of The Hague in the South Holland province in the southwestern part of the Netherlands

dt: {bc}to become connected to (something, such as a computer network or a source of electrical power)

dt.t: We don't have the hardware we need to {it}hook into{/it} the network.

shortdef: to become connected to (something, such as a computer network or a source of electrical power)
